name: appbar
description: An Appbar lives at the top of your web application and contains a header, subheader and basic styles

name: calendar
description: A component acting as a calendar widget that can be manipulated with minimal user-written code/layout

name: datepicker
description: A polyfill for <input type='date'> utilizing the x-calendar component and returning an ISO-formatted date string to the server

name: flipbox
description: Flipbox acts like a playing card that has a front and back and allows you to 'flip' between the sides

name: modal
description: A modal element with a transparent overlay

name: panel
description: A panel is a block element that has the ability to load data asynchronously when a src attribute is set

name: layout
description: Structural element for responsive content viewing and context switching

name: slidebox
description: A container that allows animated transitions between content panes. Slide Box supports horizontal and vertical transitions

name: toggle
description: Super awesome toggle switch

name: tooltip
description: Tooltips provide content that appears in current context to point at an element

name: camera
description: Web Component wrapper for getUserMedia API using Polymer

name: facebook
description: Web Component wrapper for Facebook's like button using Polymer

name: github
description: Web Component wrapper for @mdo's GitHub button using Polymer

name: twitter
description: Web Component wrapper for Twitter's share button using Polymer

name: gmaps
description: Web Component wrapper for Google Maps using Polymer

name: tracking
description: Web Component wrapper for tracking.js library using Polymer

name: youtube
description: Web Component wrapper for Youtube's player using Polymer

name: gravatar
description: Web Component wrapper for Gravatar using Polymer

name: vimeo
description: Web Component wrapper for Vimeo's player using Polymer

name: timeago
description: Timeago element using Polymer and Moment.js
